downloadTitle: Quick Start to Office 365 operated by 21Vianet for Small to Medium Businesses
downloadDescription: Get everyone up and running quickly with our guide to Change Management for small to medium businesses. Use the tips, samples, and templates to build awareness and get your users excited about Office 365 operated by 21Vianet.
detailsSection:
Users are the key to realizing the full potential of your investment in Office 365 operated by 21Vianet. To drive user adoption to its highest potential, use our proven change management strategy to clearly articulate the benefits of Office 365, build a community among your users, and provide the right help and support at the right times.

In this download package, you'll find the Fast Track Guide for Small to Medium Businesses, which describes best practices that organizations have used to drive up new technology adoption and maximize their return on investment. A comprehensive set of samples and templates let you build a customized set of project planning documents and user awareness materials based on your specific organization's needs.

Included in this download package:
  • Fast Track to Office 365 operated by 21Vianet: tips and best practices for small to medium businesses
  • Email samples
  • Presentations for introducing Office 365 operated by 21Vianet
  • Posters and other print communications
  • Help desk and support resources
  • User learning resources
Important: After you download the file, extract the .zip file to a folder.
systemRequirementsSection: • This download contains Microsoft Office Word and PowerPoint documents. Use Microsoft Office programs to open these documents. Users who do not have Microsoft Word or PowerPoint can view the documents through the downloadable Word Viewer or PowerPoint Viewer.
installInstructionSection: 1. Choose the Download button on this page to start the download. Or, select a different language from the drop-down list, and then Choose Go.
